description: Tower of Hanoi: using the optimal way to move an even number of disks from peg 0 to peg 2 or an odd number from peg 0 to peg 1, a(n) is the smallest disk on peg 1 after n moves (or 0 if there are no disks on peg 1).
example: Start by moving first disk from peg 0 to peg 1, second disk from peg 0 to peg 2, first disk from peg 1 to peg 2, etc. so sequence starts 0,1,1,0,...
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 03 2001
